subject: ClassNotFoundException
msgSnippet: I am trying to use JUnit to test a method which calls Class.forName( myClassName ) however I get a ClassNotFoundException from this line of code, which works
messageBody:
I am trying to use JUnit to test a method which calls

Class.forName("myClassName")

however I get a ClassNotFoundException from this line of code, which
works perfectly when not using JUnit.

Any ideas??

David.
